TopicTitle: Hi what an awesome little game

Articles.Content:
Hi

Saw this little gem in a youtube video.

Tried the demo.

Had to purchase. One of the best games in development in a long time.

Took me back to being a kid playing with my lego.

Experimenting and finding new ways to solve problems.

Thank You for your commitment.

Look forward to many hours of gaming.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
